short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast and easy way to access shortened https://aka.ms/{} URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using a keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+K or Cmd+Shift+K) open up the extension and type in the suffix (ex:msw) and hit enter. 

This will open up https://aka.ms/msw in a new tab. and also, this gets stored locally and helps you with a typeahead hints next time. 

You will also be able to delete these saved terms from the options page.
